decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location plan (unnumbered, dated April 2013), EX1, EX2, EX3, EX4, SK1 Rev. A, PL2 Rev A, PL3 Rev A, PL4 Rev A, Flood Risk matrix (unnumbered, no date), Design and Access Statement prepared by FERRARI Architects dated April 2013. Received 25 April 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of two rear extensions to the first floor of the property
